message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable. I'll take $60, leaving you with $40.  The money loses value quickly, so don't wait too long.
Bob, it's clear we both lose if we wait too long.  I'll take $60, you take $40.  This is better than you'll get if we wait another round!
